question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/value_exchange.rs] [ViewState Branches] [State Transition Race] If the ViewState switches from Unsync to Sync during value exchange operations, can this race condition leave some delayed fields in the wrong state store? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/value_exchange.rs] [ViewState::Unsync] [Sequential Consistency] Can read_delayed_field() in sequential mode fail to maintain proper ordering with concurrent validator operations, breaking determinism? (High)
